title: Many Babies Manual
text:
Onward!
Thanks for joining us at ManyBabies! The full source code for the manual is available at https://github.com/manybabies/mb-manual. We encourage you to browse, comment, and log issues or suggestions.1
1 The best way to give us specific feedback is to create an issue on our github page at https://github.com/manybabies/mb-manual/issues.

title: Many Babies Manual
Many Babies Manual
text:
Acknowledgments
This manual was adapted from Experimentology, a open textbook of experimental psychology methods (Frank et al. 2025). We follow in the footsteps of the Experimentology authors by offering this manual openly licensed via CC BY-NC 4.0.
Thanks to the contributions of countless ManyBabies members for their efforts in developing the content of this manual.
